newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - LHS Group started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - LHS Group started at buy.

text.p: Robertson, Stephens and Co analyst Eric Upin has begun coverage of LHS Group, a provider of software for digital wireless telecommunications companies, with a buy rating.
-- LHS's primary product handles billing and transactions.
-- LHS is well positioned in what he believes is the early stage of a high-growth market, Upin said in a statement.
-- He said the market size is about $1.4 to $1.6 billion.
-- Upin forecasts 1997 earnings of $0.37 a share on sales of $94.1 million and 1998 earnings of $0.62 a share on sales of $129.1 million.
-- LHS shares were up 1/4 at 41-1/4 early Tuesday afternoon.
